card.title: Description
card.content:
With this functionality you can ...
- export the currently active project. - share your work with others.

steps.step: Under the Project menu, click on **Export**.
Choose a location to save your *Project Database File* on your computer in the file dialog.
Wait for the export process to finish.
Send the *Project Database File* to others.

details.item: The *Project Database File* is a SQLite3 database file. To ensure a successful import, the project must have been exported through the PySSA application.
